title: Windows 10 - Firefox browser (93) and PDF changes
content:
Others have asked similar questions but mine hasn't been addressed yet...

I am on Windows 10 and my Firefox browser is at version 93. Ever since the last update, ALL of my PDF files now show up in file explorer as "Firefox HTML" documents. I have changed it so that they open as Acrobat PDF, but the file extentions all got changed from PDF to HTML. Even when I create/save them as .pdf, Firefox automatically changes them. I DO NOT LIKE THIS!! It makes them impossible to tell apart from actual HTML files in the file list!! I have not yet tried uploading the to Google Drive or attaching them to emails and sending that way. This is a MESS. How can I restore it such that Firefox leaves my PDFs alone???? Whose brilliant idea was this to begin with and WHY???
creator: s_melton2004

title: Private Mode
content:
When I access certain web sites in Private Mode, the browser delays about 4 seconds before loading the web site, but when using Firefox in regular mode, the web site loads normally. I notice this only with some non-https web sites (http).

This does not happen with other browsers; for example, Incognito Mode in Chrome does not have this issue.

I have tested Firefox on numerous installations both old and new on numerous PCs, and it always does this.

What is the problem? Is it a bug in Firefox or an anomaly with the way some non-https web sites interact with Firefox?
creator: les25

title: Kirjanmerkit
content:
Hei.

Haluaisin tietää, miten saan kirjanmerkkini takaisin. Poistin epähuomiossa Mozilla Firefox-selaimen, ja latasin sitten uuden. Samalla kaikki kirjanmerkkini katosivat, kuinka ne voi palauttaa?

Nimimerkki "aina hukassa"
creator: reijo.amper

title: deleted secondary email still link to my account
content: I registered my account using email <A>, and the primary email is <A>. Then I want to change it to email , so I followed the tutorial https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/change-primary-email-address-firefox-accounts . I added <B> as my secondary email, then set <B> primary email. So <A> became secondary email and I removed it. But when I tried to login in, I typed email <A>, the website warned me to use my primary email (I know it is <B>). And I still receive email in my <A> from firefox. So there are still a connection between email <A> and my firefox account. How to solve it?
creator: my790978513

title: Removed win10 Office 365 app now firefox is dead.
content:
PC was running fine and firefox. Removed the office365 app that comes with win10 and now its no go. Reinstalled and no go. Done safe mode and no go. Removed all files and new install of firefox still no go.

So I have to say that may be office365 app has removed some important files that were shared. I haven't installed office365 as I use office pro 2010 which still works fine. Im used that snarky edge browser at the moment.

Any ideas?

title: HTML5 Rendering
content: I recently updated to Version 93 and noticed something strange. I play a game in Facebook. The game is in HTML5. When I play the game the rendering of the graphics appears to be noticeably slower than in version 92. I don't know how else to describe the problem. As I play the game and click on the graphics to do something, it takes a noticeable lag in time before the change takes place.
creator: vhradice

title: Sync issue
content: I had to format my windows- signed up to my account- no bookmarks or tab or settings have been restored. Is there a way to start and get them back?
creator: wasp252

title: Saving to iPhone files
content: Hello everyone! I’ve been saving since over two years all my important documents , pictures and files on my iPhone under the folder files>On My iPhone>Firefox. Then suddenly like around a month ago I’ve had a problem loading the Firefox app, then I’ve decided to delete it and reinstall it. Afterwards I was surprised by all the files and pictures which were saved under (Firefox) were all deleted. Any idea how can I restore them back since they’re extremely important for me ? Thank you millions for your help! Kind regards, Minas
creator: mina.roushdy

title: parentbuild processors - multi
content:
why do I get multiple parentbuildID processors running in one session? It makes me worry (on this windows 7 machine)

I understand childID1 and up. On release 94, the parentbuildID numeric values are the same. Change my 'WHY' to just "Is this normal and OK?"

title: Cannot Read Email Problem
content:
When I click on an email in Outlook.live.com, the email shows me an error message that says "Your message cannot be displayed right now..."

My internet connection is fine. And I can read my email using Chrome and Edge, just not in Firefox. I am using Firefox version 94 with Windows 10. This problem just started today, and I haven't added any plugins.

How do I fix this?

title: Application error: a client-side exception has occurred (see the browser console for more information).
content:
A website I use frequently has recently been causing error; "Application error: a client-side exception has occurred (see the browser console for more information)." to show up when I visit some of their pages but not all.

Example: https://www.guitarcenter.com/Used/Ibanez/RG5121-Prestige-Solid-Body-Electric-Guitar.gc

The page begins to load and then presents this error. Any help would be appreciated.

title: I can not update from 78 to 91
content: Dear Firefox Team, I have installed Firefox-ESR on my HP Chromebook 11, using linux. I saw it going slow so I searched up stuff. I went to "whatsmybrowser.org", saying Firefox 78. I saw that on an article there is 91 and 95. It is 11/3/21, and no update is showing up which a help article said "On 11/2/21, users can update to Firefox-ESR version 91." I couldn't update, so I am now asking for help. Its also going VERY SLOW which I can barely run scratch, google, and even the homepage. Please give me answers so I can fix the problem. Thanks, cogithedog.
